item.title: Analyzing Inpatient Data From the Hospital Charge Data Set
item.description: About the dataset The dataset is openly available. It shows the provider summary for the top 100 Diagnosis-Related Groups (DRG) for the year 2011 in the US. DRGs only capture diagnosis groups which encompass related diagnoses for ease of classification and coding. However, the details are lost with this. Columns in the dataset The dataset has the following columns: DRG Definition (diagnosis) Provider Id Provider Name
